page.title: 10CHILDRENS VIEWS OF CUCKFIELD
page.content: Children of Cuckfield County Primary School aged 7-10 like living in Cuckfield because it has the friendly atmosphere of a small country village. Clubs and social groups are an integral part of their everyday life. Brownies, cubs, dancing, church choir, cricket and football clubs are most popular. 10-11 year olds think that a cinema, swimming pool and a BMX track would improve Cuckfield. 7-8 year olds prefer Cuckfield as it is. The majority of families in Cuckfield shop in the larger surrounding towns e.g. Burgess Hill. Children use the Cuckfield shops to buy sweets, toys, etc. Most children prefer Cuckfield in the summer as they can then enjoy their favourite aspects of Cuckfield: The park and sporting clubs. Most feel Cuckfield has something to offer all.
